channel.title: Server Development +Help Needed+
channel.description: Hey guys, Im using richscape v2 and after editting client.java and environment variables i compile the files and then run but i get the following error(s): ':: Port: :: 43594 :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_05... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFounError: server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run<URLClassLoader.java:200> at java.security.AcessController.doPrivilieged<Native Method> at jave.net.URLClassLoader.findClass<URLClassLoader.java:188> at java.lang.ClassLoad.loadClass<ClassLoader.java:306> at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass<Launcher.java:276> at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass<ClassLoader.java:251> at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal<ClassLoader.java:319> :: Failed! Press any key to continue . . .'

item.title: Server Development +Help Needed+

item.description:
@MuSSii wrote:

Hey guys,
Im using richscape v2 and after editting client.java and environment variables i compile the files and then run but i get the following error(s):
‘:: Port:
:: 43594
:: Running using JDK 1.6.0_05…
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFounError: server
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.runURLClassLoader.java:200
at java.security.AcessController.doPrivilieged
at jave.net.URLClassLoader.findClassURLClassLoader.java:188
at java.lang.ClassLoad.loadClassClassLoader.java:306
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClassLauncher.java:276
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassClassLoader.java:251
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternalClassLoader.java:319
:: Failed!
Press any key to continue . . .’
